I tried creating a crawl job using the JOBS --> Based on Recovery -->
and s=
electing 'recover.log' link. In doing so I get the following
alert. Based o=
n the information in the manual I believe this is due to
the recover.gz bei=
ng greater than 2GB when uncompressed.
Exception:   	
org.archive.crawler.f=
ramework.exceptions.FatalConfigurationException:
Recover.log
/export/webarc=
hive/jobs/A_ScopeB_case_insens_no_p_s_c-20071026152830186/logs/recover.gz
p=
roblem: java.io.IOException: Corrupt GZIP trailer

$ gunzip recover.gz

gunzip: recover.gz: unexpected end of file

What can I do to get around the=
se issues in order to recover the crawl ?
